title: Basic.en
content: Obsidian Beginner‚Äôs Guide (English) ‚Äì Clean & Visual Index [[#001. Install Obsidian in 1 Minute]] [[#002. Switch to Uzbek Language Fast]] [[#003. Create New Note in One Click]] [[#004. Headings with Hash Levels]] [[#005. How to Make Text Bold in Obsidian]] [[#006. How to Write Italic Text Fast]] [[#007. Strikethrough Text Tutorial]] [[#008. Highlight Important Text Easily]] [[#009. Toolbar Quick Formatting Tips]] [[#010. Horizontal Divider Line in Obsidian]] [[#011. Block Quotes for Better Notes]] [[#012. Bulleted Lists in Obsidian]] [[#013. Numbered Lists Step by Step]] [[#014. Indent and Outdent Lists]] [[#015. Task Checkboxes in Obsidian]] [[#016. Add External Links Correctly]] [[#017. Simple Internal Links Wiki Style]] [[#018. Aliased Internal Links]] [[#019. Link to Headings Inside Note]] [[#020. Embed Notes with Exclamation]] [[#021. Code Blocks and Syntax Highlight]] [[#022. Create Tables in Obsidian Fast]] [[#023. Assets Folder Setup]] [[#024. Embed Audio Files in Notes]] [[#025. Embed Local Video Files Easily]] [[#026. Embed PDF Documents in Obsidian]] [[#027. Add and Embed Images Properly]] [[#028. Embed Maps]] [[#029. Callouts for Beautiful Notes]] [[#030. Flowcharts and Diagrams Fast (Mermaid)]] LaTeX [!warning] Reminder: Below syntax examples are given. Some of them should be wrapped with two ``` backticks when using. They are marked as #InsideTripleBacktics in examples. 001. Install Obsidian in 1 Minute Jump to [[#Index]] Go to obsidian.md Download the installer for your OS (Windows/Mac/Linux) Run the installer ‚Üí Follow prompts Launch Obsidian ‚Üí Done! It's free and open-source. 002. Switch to Uzbek Language Fast Jump to [[#Index]] Settings ‚Üí Appearance ‚Üí Language Select ‚ÄúUzbek (–é–∑–±–µ–∫)‚Äù Restart the app ‚Üí Everything switches to Uzbek. 003. Create New Note in One Click Jump to [[#Index]] Press Ctrl + N ‚Üí New blank note Or click ‚Äú+‚Äù in the left sidebar Name the file right away (supports Latin or Cyrillic). 004. Headings with Hash Levels Jump to [[#Index]] Syntax: # H1 Heading (Biggest) ## H2 Heading ### H3 Heading #### H4 Heading ##### H5 Heading ###### H6 Heading (smallest) Result: H1 Heading (Biggest) H2 Heading H3 Heading H4 Heading H5 Heading H6 Heading (smallest) 005. How to Make Text Bold in Obsidian Jump to [[#Index]] Syntax: **bold** or __bold__ Result: bold or bold 006. How to Write Italic Text Fast Jump to [[#Index]] Syntax: *italic* or _italic_ Result: italic or italic 007. Strikethrough Text Tutorial Jump to [[#Index]] Syntax: ~~strikethrough~~ Result: strikethrough 008. Highlight Important Text Easily Jump to [[#Index]] Syntax: ==highlight== Result: 009. Toolbar Quick Formatting Tips Jump to [[#Index]] Select text ‚Üí use: Ctrl+B ‚Üí bold Ctrl+I ‚Üí italic Ctrl+D ‚Üí strikethrough Alt+H ‚Üí highlight 010. Horizontal Divider Line in Obsidian Jump to [[#Index]] Syntax: --- *** ___ Result: 011. Block Quotes for Better Notes Jump to [[#Index]] Syntax: > Single level quote >> Nested quote Result: Single level quote Nested quote 012. Bulleted Lists in Obsidian Jump to [[#Index]] Syntax: - Item 1 - Item 2 - Sub-item Result: Item 1 Item 2 Sub-item 013. Numbered Lists Step by Step Jump to [[#Index]] Syntax: 1. First 2. Second 3. Sub 1 4. Sub 2 Result: First Second 3. Sub 1 4. Sub 2 014. Indent and Outdent Lists Jump to [[#Index]] Tab ‚Üí indent Shift+Tab ‚Üí outdent 015. Task Checkboxes in Obsidian Jump to [[#Index]] Syntax: - [ ] Not done - [x] Done - [>] Deferred - [?] Question Result: Not done Done [>] Deferred [?] Question 016. Add External Links Correctly Jump to [[#Index]] Syntax: [Obsidian](https://obsidian.md) Result: ‚Üí Obsidian 017. Simple Internal Links Wiki Style Jump to [[#Index]] Syntax: \[\[031. Math in Obsidian\]\] Result: ‚Üí 031. Math in Obsidian 018. Aliased Internal Links Jump to [[#Index]] Syntax: \[\[031. Math in Obsidian|LaTeX Guide\]\] Result: ‚Üí [LaTeX Guide](031. Math in Obsidian) 019. Link to Headings Inside Note Jump to [[#Index]] Syntax: \[\[Obsidian Guide#005. How to Make Text Bold in Obsidian|Bold Text\]\] Result: ‚Üí [Bold Text](Obsidian Guide#005. How to Make Text Bold in Obsidian) 020. Embed Notes with Exclamation Jump to [[#Index]] Syntax: !\[\[001. Install Obsidian in 1 Minute\]\] Result: ‚Üí (embeds the whole note here) Resize example: !\[\[photo.jpg|300\]\] 021. Code Blocks and Syntax Highlight Jump to [[#Index]] Syntax:python print("Hello Obsidian!") Result: print("Hello Obsidian!") 022. Create Tables in Obsidian Fast Jump to [[#Index]] Syntax: | Name | Age | City | |:-------|:---:|-----------:| | Ali | 25 | Tashkent | | Vali | 30 | Samarkand | Result: Name Age City Ali 25 Tashkent Vali 30 Samarkand 023. Assets Folder Setup Jump to [[#Index]] Syntax: Create folder ‚Üí Assets or Attachments ‚Üí drop all media there. 024. Embed Audio Files in Notes Jump to [[#Index]] Syntax: !\[\[song.mp3\]\] Plays inline. Result: 025. Embed Local Video Files Easily Jump to [[#Index]] Syntax: markdown !\[\[video.mp4\]\] html <video src="local_path_or_external_url_link" width="300" autoplay muted></video> Result: 026. Embed PDF Documents in Obsidian Jump to [[#Index]] Syntax: !\[\[paper.pdf\]\] !\[\[paper.pdf|200\]\] !\[\[paper.pdf#page=5\]\] Shows page 5 directly. Result: !200 027. Add and Embed Images Properly Jump to [[#Index]] Syntax: ![[photo.jpg]] !400x300 !right Aligns right with width 250px. Result: 028. Embed Maps Jump to [[#Index]] Syntax: <iframe width=600 height=600 src="the_url_of_a_map" /> Result: 029. Callouts for Beautiful Notes Jump to [[#Index]] Syntax: > [!info] Title > Useful information Result: [!info] Title Useful information Syntax: > [!tip] Quick Tip > Save time with this! Result: [!tip] Quick Tip Save time with this! Syntax: > [!warning] Careful > This might break something Result: [!warning] Careful This might break something Other types: note, abstract, success, error, example, quote 030. Flowcharts and Diagrams (Mermaid) Jump to [[#Index]] #InsideTripleBacktics Syntax: mermaid graph TD A[Start] --> B{Decision} B -->|Yes| C[Good] B -->|No| D[Try Again] Result: graph TD A[Start] --> B{Decision} B -->|Yes| C[Good] B -->|No| D[Try Again] 031. Math in Obsidian | LaTeX Jump to [[#Index]] Inline: Syntax `$E = mc^2--- {"dg-publish":true,"permalink":"/education/obsidian-tutorial/basic-en/","noteIcon":"","created":"2025-11-25T18:04:33.314+05:00","updated":"2025-11-26T00:00:08.499+05:00"} Obsidian Beginner‚Äôs Guide (English) ‚Äì Clean & Visual Index [[#001. It's free and open-source. 002. Create New Note in One Click Jump to [[#Index]] Press Ctrl + N ‚Üí New blank note Or click ‚Äú+‚Äù in the left sidebar Name the file right away (supports Latin or Cyrillic). 004. Headings with Hash Levels Jump to [[#Index]] Syntax: # H1 Heading (Biggest) ## H2 Heading ### H3 Heading #### H4 Heading ##### H5 Heading ###### H6 Heading (smallest) Result: H1 Heading (Biggest) H2 Heading H3 Heading H4 Heading H5 Heading H6 Heading (smallest) 005. How to Make Text Bold in Obsidian]]) 020. Embed Notes with Exclamation Jump to [[#Index]] Syntax: !\[\[001. Install Obsidian in 1 Minute\]\] Result: ‚Üí (embeds the whole note here) Resize example: !\[\[photo.jpg|300\]\] 021. Create Tables in Obsidian Fast Jump to [[#Index]] Syntax: | Name | Age | City | |:-------|:---:|-----------:| | Ali | 25 | Tashkent | | Vali | 30 | Samarkand | Result: Name Age City Ali 25 Tashkent Vali 30 Samarkand 023. Next step: enable Core Plugins ‚Üí Graph View, Daily Notes, and explore Community Plugins. Happy note-taking! üöÄ

title: Basic.uz
content: Obsidian ‚Äî Boshlovchilar uchun qo'llanma (O'zbek tilida) Mundarija 001. Yangi hamyon ochish (Yangi Vault yaratish) 002. O'zbek Tiliga O'tish 003. Yangi Eslatma Yaratish 004. Sarlavhalar Bilan Ishlash 005. Qalin Matn Yozish 006. Qiya Matn Yozish 007. Ustiga Chizilgan Matn 008. Matnni Belgilash (Highlight) 009. Tez Formatlash 010. Gorizontal Chiziq 011. Blok Iqtibos Yaratish 012. Tartiblanmagan Ro'yxat 013. Tartiblangan Ro'yxat 014. Ro'yxat Sathini O'zgartirish 015. Checkbox Vazifalar (Task) 016. Tashqi Havola Qo'yish 017. Oddiy Ichki Link 018. Nomlangan Ichki Link 019. Sarlavhaga Link Berish 020. Eslatmani Biriktirish (Embed) 021. Kod Bloklari Yaratish 022. Jadval Qo'shish 023. Media Uchun Papka Tayyorlash 024. Musiqa Biriktirish 025. Video Biriktirish 026. PDF Biriktirish 027. Rasm Biriktirish 028. Xarita Biriktirish (Obsidian Maps yoki oddiy) 029. Konvert Bloklari (Callouts) 030. Mermaid Diagrammalar 031. Matematik Ifodalar | LaTeX [!warning] Eslatma: Quyida sintaksis namunalari berilgan. Foydalanish vaqtida ulardan ba'zilari ``` (uchtalik tirnoq) bilan o'ralishi kerak. Bu kabilar #UchtalikTirnoqIchida tegi bilan belgilangan. 001. Yangi hamyon ochish (Yangi Vault yaratish) [[#Mundarija]]ga o'tish Obsidian-ni oching ‚ÄúCreate new vault‚Äù tugmasini bosing Vault nomini kiriting (masalan: ¬´Mening Bilimlarim¬ª) Kompyuteringizda kerakli joyni tanlang ‚Üí ‚ÄúCreate‚Äù Tayyor! Endi bu papka ichidagi barcha .md fayllar Obsidian bilan ochiladi. 002. O'zbek Tiliga O'tish [[#Mundarija]]ga o'tish Sozlamalar ‚Üí Appearance ‚Üí Language ‚ÄúUzbek (–é–∑–±–µ–∫)‚Äù ni tanlang Dasturni qayta ishga tushiring ‚Üí hammasi o‚Äòzbekcha bo‚Äòladi. 003. Yangi Eslatma Yaratish [[#Mundarija]]ga o'tish Ctrl + N ‚Üí yangi bo‚Äòsh eslatma Yoki chap paneldagi ‚Äú+‚Äù belgini bosing Fayl nomini darhol lotin yoki kirillda yozishingiz mumkin. 004. Sarlavhalar Bilan Ishlash [[#Mundarija]]ga o'tish Syntax: # H1 (Eng katta) ## H2 ### H3 #### H4 ##### H5 ###### H6 (Eng kichik) Result: H1 (Eng katta) H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 (Eng kichik) 005. Qalin Matn Yozish [[#Mundarija]]ga o'tish Syntax: **qalin matn** yoki __qalin matn__ Result: qalin matn yoki qalin matn 006. Qiya Matn Yozish [[#Mundarija]]ga o'tish Syntax: *qiya matn* yoki _qiya matn_ Result: qiya matn yoki qiya matn 007. Ustiga Chizilgan Matn [[#Mundarija]]ga o'tish Syntax: ~~ustiga chizilgan~~ Result: ustiga chizilgan 008. Matnni Belgilash (Highlight) [[#Mundarija]]ga o'tish Syntax: ==belgilangan matn== yoki `bitta backtick ichida` Result: belgilangan matn yoki bitta backtick ichida 009. Tez Formatlash [[#Mundarija]]ga o'tish Tanlangan matn ustida: Ctrl + B ‚Üí qalin Ctrl + I ‚Üí qiya Ctrl + D ‚Üí ustiga chizish Alt + H ‚Üí belgilash 010. Gorizontal Chiziq [[#Mundarija]]ga o'tish Syntax: --- yoki *** yoki ___ Result: yoki yoki 011. Blok Iqtibos Yaratish [[#Mundarija]]ga o'tish Syntax: > Oddiy iqtibos > > > Ichma-ich iqtibos Result: Oddiy iqtibos Ichma-ich iqtibos 012. Tartiblanmagan Ro'yxat [[#Mundarija]]ga o'tish Syntax: - Birinchi band - Ikkinchi band - Ichki band (2 bo‚Äòsh joy yoki Tab) Result: Birinchi band Ikkinchi band Ichki band (2 bo‚Äòsh joy yoki Tab) 013. Tartiblangan Ro'yxat [[#Mundarija]]ga o'tish Syntax: 1. Birinchi 2. Ikkinchi 3. Ichki 1 4. Ichki 2 Result: Birinchi Ikkinchi 3. Ichki 1 4. Ichki 2 014. Ro'yxat Sathini O'zgartirish [[#Mundarija]]ga o'tish - Tab ‚Üí o‚Äòngga surish (sathni oshirish) - Shift + Tab ‚Üí chapga surish (sathni kamaytirish) 015. Checkbox Vazifalar (Task) [[#Mundarija]]ga o'tish Syntax: - [ ] Bajarilmagan vazifa - [x] Bajarilgan vazifa - [>] Keyinga qoldirilgan - [?] Savol Result: Bajarilmagan vazifa Bajarilgan vazifa [>] Keyinga qoldirilgan [?] Savol 016. Tashqi Havola Qo'yish [[#Mundarija]]ga o'tish Syntax: [FarGoneE](https://fargonee.github.io) Result: FarGoneE 017. Oddiy Ichki Link [[#Mundarija]]ga o'tish Syntax: [[Basic.en]] Result: Basic.uz 018. Nomlangan Ichki Link [[#Mundarija]]ga o'tish Syntax: Obsidian asoslari (ingliz) Result: Obsidian asoslari (ingliz) 019. Sarlavhaga Link Berish [[#Mundarija]]ga o'tish Syntax: Oldingi mavzu Result: Oldingi mavzu 020. Eslatmani Biriktirish (Embed) [[#Mundarija]]ga o'tish Syntax: <div class="transclusion internal-embed is-loaded"><div class="markdown-embed"> Bu eslatma namuna uchun! </div></div> Result: Bu eslatma namuna uchun! 021. Kod Bloklari Yaratish [[#Mundarija]]ga o'tish Syntax #InsideTripleBacktics: python print("Salom dunyo!") Result: print("Salom dunyo!") 022. Jadval Qo'shish [[#Mundarija]]ga o'tish Syntax: | Ism | Yosh | Shahar | |------------|:----:|-----------| | Ali | 25 | Toshkent | | Vali | 30 | Samarqand | Result: 023. Media Uchun Papka Tayyorlash [[#Mundarija]]ga o'tish Vault ichida papka yarating ‚Üí masalan: assets yoki resurslar Keyin media fayllarni shu yerga tashlang. 024. Musiqa Biriktirish [[#Mundarija]]ga o'tish Syntax: ![[music.mp3]] yoki to‚Äòg‚Äòridan hyperlink: [audio](music.mp3) Result: 025. Video Biriktirish [[#Mundarija]]ga o'tish Syntax: ![[video.mp4]] yoki YouTube: ![[https://youtu.be/dQw4w9WgXcQ]] Result: 026. PDF Biriktirish [[#Mundarija]]ga o'tish Syntax: ![[kitob.pdf]] yoki faqat sahifani ko‚Äòrsatish: ![[kitob.pdf#page=15]] Result: 027. Rasm Biriktirish [[#Mundarija]]ga o'tish Syntax: ![[rasm.jpg]] !300x400 ‚Üê kenglik va balandlik !right ‚Üê o‚Äòng tomonda Result: 028. Xarita Biriktirish (Obsidian Maps yoki oddiy) [[#Mundarija]]ga o'tish Syntax: ![[xarita.png]] yoki onlayn xarita: [Google Maps](https://maps.app.goo.gl/...) Result: 029. Konvert Bloklari (Callouts) [[#Mundarija]]ga o'tish Syntax: > [!info] Ma‚Äôlumot > Bu yerda muhim ma‚Äôlumotlar > [!tip] Maslahat > Foydali maslahat > [!warning] Ehtiyot bo‚Äòling > Xavfli harakat > [!question] Savol > Nimani aniqlashtirish kerak? Boshqa turlari: note, abstract, success, error, example, quote Result: 030. Mermaid Diagrammalar [[#Mundarija]]ga o'tish Syntax #InsideTripleBacktics: mermaid graph TD A[Obsidian] --> B[Yangi eslatma] A --> C[Linklar] A --> D[Pluginlar] Result: graph TD A[Obsidian] --> B[Yangi eslatma] A --> C[Linklar] A --> D[Pluginlar] 031. Matematik Ifodalar | LaTeX [[#Mundarija]]ga o'tish Bir qatorli: Syntax: $E = mc^2$ Result: E=mc2 Blok ichida: Syntax: $$ \int_0^\infty e^{-x^2} dx = \frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2} $$ Result: ‚à´0‚àûe‚àíx2dx=œÄ2 Tabriklaymiz, endi siz Obsidian-ning asosiy funksiyalarini to‚Äòliq bilasiz!

title: Overview.en
content: Sorry for that, the obsidian tutorial series were recorded in uzbek.

title: Welcome to online!.en
content: See why you should choose me?

title: Why you should choose me?.en
content:
Why Clients Will Choose ME Over Any Other Web Developer

You wake up tomorrow with a real, live, public website already online ‚Äì no waiting weeks, no back-and-forth, no ‚Äúlearning curve‚Äù. I deliver it 100 % ready in 24‚Äì48 hours.
Zero recurring costs forever: no hosting bills, no WordPress updates, no plugin subscriptions. GitHub Pages = free for life.
You keep 100 % ownership and control ‚Äì everything lives in your own GitHub account (not mine, not some shady agency server).
I set it up so you never touch code again if you don‚Äôt want to. You just open Obsidian (the app you probably already love) ‚Üí write or drag-and-drop ‚Üí save ‚Üí your site updates automatically in seconds.

Why Obsidian Is the Perfect Brain for Your Website

You already think in notes and links ‚Äì Obsidian is the best tool on earth for that.
Write once, publish everywhere: the same vault becomes your personal knowledge base AND your public website.
Beautiful typography, instant search, tags, backlinks, graph view ‚Äì all work on the live site with zero extra plugins.
Works offline, syncs with your phone, supports folders, images, PDFs, embeds, everything you already use.
Future-proof: if you ever outgrow it, your content is just Markdown files ‚Äì you can move anywhere tomorrow.

Why GitHub + GitHub Pages Beats Every Other Option

What People Usually Pay For
Monthly Cost
Your Cost With My Service

Shared hosting + WordPress
$5‚Äì30/mo
$0 forever

Netlify / Vercel (free tier)
$0‚Äì20/mo
$0 forever

Custom domain (you bring it)
$12/year
Same $12/year

Security updates, backups, plugins
Hours of work
Handled automatically

GitHub Pages is powered by the same infrastructure that runs millions of sites ‚Äì rock-solid, globally fast, HTTPS by default.
Automatic HTTPS certificate, automatic scaling, 99.99 % uptime ‚Äì better than most paid hosts.
Built-in version history: break something? Just click ‚Äúrevert‚Äù in GitHub. No backups to manage.

Why So Incredibly Cheap ($5‚Äì10 range)
Because I‚Äôm not selling you hosting, servers, or my time forever.
I‚Äôm selling you one afternoon of my expertise to save you 50+ hours of frustration and hundreds of dollars per year.
Most freelancers charge $300‚Äì$1500 for a custom static site.
I charge less than a dinner for two because:

The entire stack is free (GitHub + Obsidian + open-source themes)
I reuse the same bulletproof template (customized for you in minutes)
My mission is to get as many people as possible publishing this way ‚Äì the lower the price, the more lives I change.

Who This Is Perfect For (make them see themselves)

Writers who are tired of Medium taking their traffic
Researchers & students who want a beautiful public vault
Indie hackers needing a landing page or documentation site
Consultants wanting a clean portfolio without the bloat
Anyone who believes their notes deserve to be seen by the world

If you‚Äôve ever thought ‚ÄúI wish my Obsidian notes could just be my website‚Äù ‚Äì this gig turns that wish into reality tomorrow morning.
Ready? Send me your GitHub username (or say ‚Äúcreate one for me‚Äù) and the site name you want.
I‚Äôll handle everything else and hand you the keys to your new permanent corner of the internet.
Click ‚ÄúOrder Now‚Äù and tomorrow you‚Äôll have a real website that updates every time you click a button in Obsidian.
